alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 7:53AM PST until December 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Inchelium, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Wauconda, Boulder Creek Road, Sherman Pass, Republic, and Chesaw Road. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will be isolated in nature with quick bursts of snow up to one inch per hour.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
